title: Le Cardonnois
content:
Le Cardonnois (French pronunciation: [lə kaʁdɔnwa]; Picard: L’Cardonois) is a commune in the Somme department in Hauts-de-France in northern France.

The commune is situated on the D188 road, some 30 miles (48 km) south-southeast of Amiens.

This Arrondissement of Montdidier geographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
